text: CLOSE PBS is suspending distribution of late - night talk show Tavis Smiley following sexual misconduct claims levied against its host. USA TODAY Tavis Smiley in April 2016 in Los Angeles. ( Photo : Rich Fury / Invision / AP ) PBS's late - night talk show Tavis Smiley was suspended Wednesday after ` ` multiple, credible allegations'' of misconduct emerged about the popular host / producer. Smiley greeted the news with shock and outrage. PBS sent a statement to USA TODAY late Wednesday declaring that the public broadcaster had ` ` indefinitely suspended'' distribution of Tavis Smiley, produced by Smiley's independent production company, TS Media. ` ` PBS engaged an outside law firm to conduct an investigation immediately after learning of troubling allegations regarding Mr. Smile
